Subroutine vom_check_water

1451 : 
1452 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1453 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1454 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1455 : !*----- check water balance --------------------------------------------
1456 : 
1457 :       subroutine vom_check_water (finish)
1458 :       use vegwatmod
1459 :       use vegmod
1460 :       use watmod
1461 :       implicit none
1462 : 
1463 :       INTEGER, INTENT(inout) :: finish
1464 : 
1465 :       REAL*8  :: error1
1466 : 
1467 :       iocum = iocum + hio
1468 :       wsnew_ = SUM(cH2Ol_s(:)) 
1469 :       error = wsold + iocum - wsnew_
1470 : !     * gives an error message if accumulated error exceeds 1 mm
1471 :       if (abs(error) .gt. 1.d-3) then
1472 :         write(*,*) 'Error in water balance [mm]:', error, 'io=', io_,  &
1473 :      &    'wsold=', wsold, 'wsnew=', wsnew_
1474 :         finish = 1
1475 :       elseif (md_ .gt. 0.d0) then
1476 :         error1 = mqold + (hruptk_ - hetm_) * 1.d6 - mqnew
1477 :         if (abs(error1 / mqnew) .gt. 1.d-6) then
1478 :           write(*,*) 'Error in tree water balance [%]:', error1 * 100.d0, &
1479 :      &      'mqold=', mqold, 'mqnew=', mqnew, 'hruptk=', hruptk_, 'hetm=', hetm_
1480 :           finish = 1
1481 :         endif
1482 :       endif
1483 : 
1484 :       return
1485 :       end subroutine vom_check_water
